name: Cleave(Prototype)
description:
Cleave is a prototype game where you have one magical sword (Called Cleave) to upgrade and defeat baddies.

TUTORIAL(so far):

Use W, A, S, D to move or arrow keys

Use left mouse click to swing your sword.

Try to slice up bad guys before they can shoot you to death.

(BUGGY FEATURE) You can block bullets from the baddies by swinging Cleave.

Once your health in your health bar (Top left corner) drops to 0 you lose

Next update you can look for:

Different types of enemies, more particle effects, actual UI and menu and upgrading Cleave (Your Sword).

PLEASE remember this is a prototype and if you find any bugs or have suggestion please tell me.
